channel.title: JustinScape 508 - Updated with Vid 4/25/2012
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]JustinScape 508 0.9[/size][/center]
I'm not going to show anything which isn't by me, so if you want to see some features or how the original source was before, then checkout zooscape.. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363213.0.html < That server must of been 'programmed' by a 10 year old... with the amount of crap that was in it.
Hey everyone this source which I am currently developing started from a Pur3zScape 508 source(Well actually zooscape BIG REGRET). Fact is I've never really been into Pking servers, more into skilling servers like bulby. Although I thought that this was a pretty fun pking source and that I could work off it and make it better in my eyes... I'll be developing it every day onwards from now until I feel no need to. I'm not quite sure whether or not I'll be releasing it.. that really depends on how well it goes for me when I host the server and whether or not it's worth keeping up. Anyways, enough talking, let's see some content ;)
Start date: April 10th, 2012
[deleted pics]
Was sick during april 15th-23rd... No work done..
Managed to get a good couple hours of work in yesterday and today... so this is how it's going now.. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j054UkocD8Q[/youtube]

item.title: JustinScape 508 - Updated with Vid 4/25/2012
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:9, topic:439312”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=542006.msg3971274#msg3971274 date=1334179025]

[quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=542006.msg3971263#msg3971263 date=1334178620]

Instead of using boxes as a Wilderness barrier, why not just make it so that when they walk past that line, it forces them back into the safe-zone, and gives them the Wilderness Warning? Hell, you’d have to make fail-safes, but It’d be better than just blocking it off.
[/quote]I wouldn’t go through all that trouble when all you got to do is click the box, and it’ll take them to the other side… I can see what you mean, but honestly… there’s no real point when the barrier works perfect and doesn’t cause any problems

I haven’t seen any server do this except for my own. There’s the point + it looks better than boxes!
[/quote]Nice though it’s not of high priority for me.

I’m just trying to give you some ideas. Good luck with this breh.[/quote]Yeah I appreciate it. Don’t think I was just passing it up… I might even do it later on, but definetely not at this moment… I’ll just say that the crates are placeholders for now… and thankyou for the suggestion… like I said I appreciate it

Read full topic

item.title: JustinScape 508 - Updated with Vid 4/25/2012
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:8, topic:439312”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=542006.msg3971263#msg3971263 date=1334178620]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=542006.msg3971215#msg3971215 date=1334176325]

Instead of using boxes as a Wilderness barrier, why not just make it so that when they walk past that line, it forces them back into the safe-zone, and gives them the Wilderness Warning? Hell, you’d have to make fail-safes, but It’d be better than just blocking it off.
[/quote]I wouldn’t go through all that trouble when all you got to do is click the box, and it’ll take them to the other side… I can see what you mean, but honestly… there’s no real point when the barrier works perfect and doesn’t cause any problems

I haven’t seen any server do this except for my own. There’s the point + it looks better than boxes!
[/quote]Nice though it’s not of high priority for me.[/quote]

I’m just trying to give you some ideas. Good luck with this breh.

Read full topic
